Getting Started¶

Chapter Summary

What you’ll learn: Basic setup and navigation Time needed: 20-30 minutes Prerequisites: None - this is your starting point!

Learning Objectives¶

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

✅ Navigate the documentation efficiently ✅ Use the progress tracking features ✅ Access hints and solutions ✅ Understand the learning pathway system

Before You Begin¶

💡 Tip for Success

Take your time! This documentation is designed for your pace. There’s no rush - focus on understanding rather than speed.

Essential Navigation¶

1. Using the Sidebar

The left sidebar shows all chapters. Click any chapter to jump there instantly.

2. Progress Tracking

3. Getting Hints

When you see a “Show Hint” button, click it for step-by-step help:

Hint 1: Look at the left side of your screen for the chapter menu.
Hint 2: You can click any chapter name to go there immediately.
Solution: The sidebar navigation is your main way to move between chapters. Try clicking "Chapter 1" now!

4. Video Content

Look for 🌐 International UI labels for accessible video content:

🌐 International UI: Navigation Demo

Check Your Understanding¶

Quick Quiz

Question: What should you do if you’re stuck on a problem?

  1. Skip to the next chapter

  2. Click “Show Hint” for step-by-step help

  3. Give up and ask someone else

What’s Next?¶

Great job! Now you’re ready for the main content. Continue to:

👉 Chapter 1: Core Concepts and Examples

If You’re Feeling Overwhelmed

Remember: everyone learns differently and at different speeds. If something doesn’t click immediately, that’s completely normal. Use the hints, take breaks, and don’t hesitate to review material multiple times.
